stimulus_tuningcurve.name: independent_variable_label
stimulus_tuningcurve.documentation: The label of the independent variable(s) (comma separated if more than one) UPDATE THIS

stimulus_tuningcurve.name: independent_variable_value
stimulus_tuningcurve.documentation: The values of the independent variable(s), one row per value

stimulus_tuningcurve.name: response_mean
stimulus_tuningcurve.documentation: The mean response to each stimulus

stimulus_tuningcurve.name: response_stddev
stimulus_tuningcurve.documentation: The standard deviation of the response to each stimulus

stimulus_tuningcurve.name: response_stderr
stimulus_tuningcurve.documentation: The standard error of the mean of the response to each stimulus

stimulus_tuningcurve.name: individual_responses_real
stimulus_tuningcurve.documentation: Real part of the response to each stimulus

stimulus_tuningcurve.name: individual_responses_imaginary
stimulus_tuningcurve.documentation: Imaginary part of the response to each stimulus

stimulus_tuningcurve.name: stimulus_presentation_number
stimulus_tuningcurve.documentation: The stimulus IDs whose responses were averaged together to get the mean value (cell array)

stimulus_tuningcurve.name: response_units
stimulus_tuningcurve.documentation: The units of the response (example: Spikes/s).

stimulus_tuningcurve.name: control_response_mean
stimulus_tuningcurve.documentation: The mean response to the control stimulus associated with each stimulus

stimulus_tuningcurve.name: control_response_stddev
stimulus_tuningcurve.documentation: The standard deviation of the control response for each stimulus

stimulus_tuningcurve.name: control_response_stderr
stimulus_tuningcurve.documentation: The standard error of the mean of the control response for each stimulus

stimulus_tuningcurve.name: control_individual_responses_real
stimulus_tuningcurve.documentation: Real part of the control response for each stimulus

stimulus_tuningcurve.name: control_individual_responses_imaginary
stimulus_tuningcurve.documentation: Imaginary part of the control response for each stimulus
